ARABIC: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُۥ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And it is He who created human beings from water and then gave them relations by blood and marriage. Your Lord is Ail-Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is He who created man from water, then gave him consanguinity and affinity. Your Lord is omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And it is He, Who created man from water: then from him He caused two kinds of kindred, by blood and by marriage: your Lord is AI I-Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who has created the human being from water to have relationships of both lineage and wedlock. Your Lord has all power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And it is He Who created man from water, then appointed relatives and in-laws for him; and your Lord is All Able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And it is He Who has created man from water, and has appointed for him kindred by blood, and kindred by marriage. And your Lord is Ever All-Powerful to do what He wills.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He it is Who has created man from the water, then He has made for him blood relationship and marriage relationship, and your Lord is powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And it is He who created of water a mortal, and made him kindred of blood and marriage; thy Lord is All-powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And He it is Who hath created man from water, and hath appointed for him kindred by blood and kindred by marriage; for thy Lord is ever Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is He who has created human beings from water and He has granted them the ties of blood as well as marriage. Your Lord is all powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And it is He who hath created man from water, and then made for him kinship by blood and marriage. And thy Lord is ever potent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is He who created the human being from water, then invested him with ties of blood and marriage, and your Lord is all-powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is He Who has created man from water: then has He established relationships of lineage and marriage: for thy Lord has power (over all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And it is He Who has created man from water, and has appointed for him kindred by blood, and kindred by marriage. And your Lord is Ever All-Powerful to do what He will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And it is He who created the human from water and gave him kindred of blood and of marriage. Your Lord is the Powerful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And it is He who, from fluid, created the human being. Then He made relationships through marriage and mating. Your Lord is Omnipotent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it is He who has created from water a human being and made him [a relative by] lineage and marriage. And ever is your Lord competent [concerning creation].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:54] And He it is Who created man from water, [He created] from a sperm-drop a human being, and made for him ties of blood and ties of marriage, whether it be a male or a female, they marry for the purposes of procreation. For your Lord is ever Powerful, with the power to do whatever He will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And He it is Who hath created man from water) from the water of the male and female, (and hath appointed for him kindred by blood) who are unmarriageable (and kindred by marriage) who are marriageable, whether they are relatives or not; (for thy Lord is) in relation to the lawful and the unlawful which He created (ever Powerful.
